Title: The Wedding of River Song
Plot: As the Doctor makes his final journey to the shores of Lake Silencio in Utah, he knows only one thing can keep the universe safe ? his own death ? in the concluding episode of this series of the time-travelling drama. But has he reckoned without the love of a good woman?
GuestStars: Alex Kingston, Ian McNeice, Meredith Vieira, Marnix Van Den Broeke, Simon Fisher-Becker, Emma Campbell-Jones, Davood Ghadami, Damian Kell, Matthew Doman
